availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert H. Lander (Caldwell County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Pernecie Wall Lander in Montgomery County, Tennessee, on August 7, 1851. Father of Charles W. Lander, Lucy W. Lander, and R.R. Lander. Grocer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned seven enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Owned eight enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 346A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 777.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 220A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 491A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 25487.
"Robert Henry Lander (1826-1895)," Find A Grave, Memorial 51779503, accessed November 20, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/51779503.
